entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell FlyoutHeader at the wrong position in WinUI #3879
  • Cannot use StaticResources for resources in App.xaml #3878
  • [Android, iOS] NavigationPage.TitleView not showing #3877
  • MaUI blazor dektop application can not publish on windows 11 preview 22523 #3876
  • Device.Info.ScaledScreenSize Interface alternatives #3875
  • Unable to run wpf blazor apps via command line in c# #3874

Closed

  • [Bug] Respond to Screen Scaling #977
    6.0.200-preview.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Proposal - Replace internal use of MessagingCenter #3880

Merged

  • [Android] Only set click listener if the item is indeed clickable #1884
    area/a11y, 6.0.200-preview.13

Updated

  • Add drag-drop item reordering to CollectionView #3767 #3768
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Implement GoBack, GoForward and Reload methods in WebViewHandler #3316
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Add CarouselView handlers on Controls [iOS] #3141
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • CarouselView android handler #3343
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Ensure that changing RowSpacing/ColumnSpacing invalidates grid #3873
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Account for spacing when determining available space for star rows/columns #3871
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Remove layout resolution #3818
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Clip layouts to bounds #3709
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Radiobutton Handler #3784
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Implement CursorPosition in IEditor/ITextInput Handlers #3196
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1846 #2605
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Update template so you can find it under Windows as well #2484
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • GridLayout -> Grid to reduce confusion #3865
    proposal/open, area/layout 🔲
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
